mapper.insert: insert into POST (POST_NUM_PK, MB_NUM_PK, POST_TITLE, POST_CON, POST_DLINE, POST_NUMOF, PSMALLC_PK, POST_PRICE, POST_DATE) values(post_seqnum.nextval, #{mb_num_pk}, #{post_title}, #{post_con}, #{post_dline}, #{post_numof}, #{psmallc_pk}, #{post_price}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select p.POST_NUM_PK, p.POST_TITLE, p.POST_VIEWS, p.POST_DATE, m.MB_ID, s.PSMALLC_NAME, b.PBIGC_NAME from post p, member m, (PSMALLC s LEFT OUTER JOIN PBIGC b ON s.PBIGC_PK = b.PBIGC_PK) where p.MB_NUM_PK = m.MB_NUM_PK and p.PSMALLC_PK = s.PSMALLC_PK order by POST_DATE desc

select p.POST_NUM_PK, p.POST_TITLE, p.POST_VIEWS, p.POST_DATE, m.MB_ID, s.PSMALLC_NAME, b.PBIGC_NAME from post p, member m, (PSMALLC s LEFT OUTER JOIN PBIGC b ON s.PBIGC_PK = b.PBIGC_PK) where p.MB_NUM_PK = m.MB_NUM_PK and p.PSMALLC_PK = s.PSMALLC_PK and p.POST_TITLE like '%'||#{post_title}||'%' order by POST_DATE desc

select p.POST_NUM_PK, p.POST_TITLE, p.POST_VIEWS, p.POST_DATE, m.MB_ID, s.PSMALLC_NAME, b.PBIGC_NAME from post p, member m, (PSMALLC s LEFT OUTER JOIN PBIGC b ON s.PBIGC_PK = b.PBIGC_PK) where p.MB_NUM_PK = m.MB_NUM_PK and p.PSMALLC_PK = s.PSMALLC_PK and (p.POST_TITLE like '%'||#{post_title}||'%' or p.POST_CON like '%'||#{post_con}||'%') order by POST_DATE desc
mapper.insert: insert into PO_REPORT (PORP_NUM_PK, PORP_TARGET_MBN, PORP_MBN, PORP_LNB, PORP_CON, PORP_DATE) values(porp_seqnum.nextval, (select MB_NUM_PK from post where POST_NUM_PK = #{porp_lnb}), #{porp_mbn}, #{porp_lnb}, #{porp_con}, sysdate)
insert into ap_post (AP_APN_PK, POST_NUM_PK, MB_NUM_PK) values(ap_seqnum.nextval, #{post_num_pk}, #{mb_num_pk})
mapper.update: update post set POST_VIEWS = POST_VIEWS + 1 where POST_NUM_PK = #{post_num_pk}
